company: Ain Shams University Virtual Hospital - HCM Labs
title: Research Assistant
description:
• Developed a TCP communication module to retrieve real-time sensor data using XML commands.
• Engineered a data synchronization system for motion capture cameras and metabolic energy sensors.
• Automated the sensor calibration process, reducing setup time and improving accuracy.
• Processed and structured large-scale physiological data, improving accessibility for researchers.

title: AI Trainer - Data Science
description:
• Originally a 3-month contract, extended due to high performance until the project’s completion.
• Processed and validated algorithm-related datasets, ensuring correctness for LLM training.
• Assisted in debugging AI-generated code by identifying logical flaws and improving its ability to understand algorithms.
• Improved data quality for algorithmic problem-solving and API responses, contributing to +80 validated algorithmic challenges.
